author: Jay Khan
description: Created by Jay Khan and inspired by Hong Kong, the Dynasty Margarita appropriately uses traditional Chinese ingredients of lychee and ginger and combines these with elderflower liqueur to make a distinctive floral Margarita.
name: Dynasty Margarita

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass pre-rimmed with grapefruit salt

video.description: Created by Jay Khan and inspired by Hong Kong, the Dynasty Margarita appropriately uses traditional Chinese ingredients of lychee and ginger and combines these with elderflower liqueur to make a distinctive floral Margarita.
video.name: HOWTO make Dynasty Margarita
